data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pariselle, Antoine, Bitja Nyom, Arnold R., Bilong Bilong, Charles F. (2014): Four new species of Cichlidogyrus (Monogenea, Ancyrocephalidae) from Sarotherodon mvogoi and Tylochromis sudanensis (Teleostei, Cichlidae) in Cameroon. Zootaxa 3881 (3): 258-266, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3881.3.4
